alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Greater Rutherford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford and southwestern Cleveland Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Forest City, or near Ellenboro, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boiling Springs NC, Ellenboro, Lattimore, Mooresboro, Cliffside, Henrietta and Caroleen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
